title: Perush Maharzu on Shir HaShirim Rabbah

schema.key: Perush Maharzu on Shir HaShirim Rabbah

enDesc: Classic 19th century commentary on Midrash Rabbah that analyzes midrash according to various patterns denoted by the author. In this way, the Midrash is presented as more rigorously attached to the verses of the Bible to which it serves as commentary.
